h3.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-ligatures: none; margin-bottom: 0px; outline: none; position: relative; color: rgb(84, 110, 122); font-size: 20px; text-decoration-line: inherit; line-height: 1.25; pointer-events: none; white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: center;

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; max-width: 100%; pointer-events: all; position: relative;

span.span: Today the Governor announced that school buildings will remain closed for the remainder of the school year and that there will be no in-person instruction for the remainder of the school year. A copy of the Governor’s Executive Order may be found [

div.style: cursor: pointer; margin-left: 4px; display: -webkit-inline-box; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-size: 16px; width: 0px; height: 0px;

br.br: Also, the State Superintendent of Public Instruction announced guidance on graduation requirements for students in this year’s graduating class. That guidance may be found [HERE

div.style: cursor: pointer; margin-left: 4px; display: -webkit-inline-box; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-size: 16px; width: 0px; height: 0px;

ol.style: box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; margin: 6px 0px 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 16px; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.style: font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: none; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration-line: inherit; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);
font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: none; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration-line: inherit; box-sizing: border-box; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

span.span: All State tests have been cancelled for the 2019-20 school year. This includes IREAD, ILEARN, ISTEP+, I AM, WIDA and ISPROUT. The Indian

span.style: font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: none; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration-line: inherit; color: rgb(0, 32, 96); font-family: Tahoma;

span.span: a Department of Education has asked us to share the following letter with parents:
